channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T06C17 maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 28, 10:00 - 12:00 UTC

Mar 6, 23:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified rack.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 28/04/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 28/04/2025 12:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in rack T06C17.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102B
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 22, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Mar 25, 22:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/04/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E102B will be temporarily unavailable during the operation.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating servers from rack E102B to rack E101D03.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA4][Cooling] - Room G404C maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 14, 06:30 - 12:00 UTC

Apr 3, 14:19 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 14/04/2025 06:30 UTC
End time : 14/04/2025 12:00 UTC
Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks W16A16 and W13B17
item.description:
Apr 5, 11:08 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the racks W16A16 and W13B17.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 05/04/2025 10:08 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the rack W16A16 and W13B17 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [LIM/RBX][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
Apr 3, 09:59 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 03/04/2025 09:40 UTC

Apr 3, 08:18 UTC
Update - This maintenance is taking longer than expected.
An update will be made when all operations have been completed.

We apologise for this inconvenience.

Apr 3, 04:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 19, 22:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 03/04/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 03/04/2025 08:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.
